main.title: Community Perks
main.description: Our community is a vibrant space where food enthusiasts come together to explore new recipes, share cooking tips, and celebrate the joy of food. Whether you're a seasoned chef or just starting out, there's a place for you here.

perks.title: Share & discover recipes
perks.description: Access a treasure trove of unique recipes shared by community members.

perks.alt: A crowd of people, cooking together
perks.title: Find new friends & like-minded people
perks.description: Learn from experienced cooks and improve your culinary skills.

perks.alt: A group of people enjoying a food event
perks.title: Participate in exclusive events
perks.description: Connect with food lovers from around the world and share your passion.
